column4: Question: I'm partially through kubuntu setup, created a partition in the largest contiguous free space (I had around 6 gigs unallocated). It created a new ext3 and swap partition and is now installing. Partition 1 on the disk is my windows xp install, yet thus far in the install, there has been no mention of the bootloader allowing me to choose which partition to boot to. Did I miss a step?
it will make ubuntu the default.  You can change it later
correct, which of course you could not do if the account were disabled
